sentences.sContent: He reads a lot of poetry.
...Ted Hughes discovered many long poems submitted for poetry competition were composed on computers...
...The rigorous requirements placed on the writing of poetry stimulate the poet's creativity...
...the poet Ted Hughes sat on the judging panel of an annual poetry competition for British schoolchildren...
...The relevance of poetry was declared more concisely in five lines from the love poem Asphodel...
...I'm not suggesting that poetry will guide our legislators to wisdom any more than prayer has...
...maybe it's time to add some poetry readings to the agenda...
...What did the author think of Professor Filreis's poetry session...
...What was the impact of the poetry session on the program participants according to Professor Filreis...
...The grim economy seems to make the participants keener than ever to think 'out of the box' in the way poetry encourages...
...in defense of poetry nearly two centuries ago...

words.tran: 诗的，诗歌的；诗意的；诗人的

trans.tranOther: poems in general, or the art of writing them
